casebody.data:
REGENCY LAKE OWNERS' ASSOCIATION, INC., and Charles Huffman
v.
REGENCY LAKE, LLC, Courtland Properties, Inc., and Joseph MacMinn No. 117P18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2018 Kathleen L. Vogel, Attorney at Law, Douglas G. Eisele, Attorney at Law, Statesville, for Regency Lake Owners' Association, Inc., et al. Kevin C. Donaldson, Attorney at Law, Mooresville, C. Marshall Horsman, Attorney at Law, for Regency Lake, LLC, et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 13th of April 2018 by Plaintiffs in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2018."
